   Greg Abbott
   stated on October 28, 2015 in a tweet:
   "Texas #2 in nation for new gun purchases, behind California."

So the Texas governor said in this October
   2015 tweet: "I'm EMBARRASSED: Texas #2 in nation for new gun purchases,

Our ruling

   Abbott said: "Texas #2 in nation for new gun purchases, behind
   CALIFORNIA."

Besides that, Texas ranked third behind Kentucky and California
   in the number of checks requested for gun purchases through the first 10
   months of 2015.
